synonyms.synonym: Low molecular weight dual specificity phosphatase 21

protein.specific_function: Can dephosphorylate single and diphosphorylated synthetic MAPK peptides, with preference for the phosphotyrosine and diphosphorylated forms over phosphothreonine.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Hood KL, Tobin JF, Yoon C: Identification and characterization of two novel low-molecular-weight dual specificity phosphatases. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2002 Nov 8;298(4):545-51.
